text:
Shipamax | Junior/Mid-level Frontend | London (Angel) | Onsite, full-time | up to 55k GBP + pension + equity

We're building a platform for the bulk shipping industry - we have terabytes of data that is processed in realtime and served up to our customers to help them make key business decisions.

We're using React/Redux/Typescript.

More here: https://angel.co/shipamax/jobs/280813-junior-mid-level-full-...
